  • Sample Stream

Sample Stream¶

The sample stream returns 1% of all the public tweets published on Twitter at any time. Twitter randomly selects one tweet for every 100 tweets and publishes this Tweet in the stream. (twitter doc)

The sample stream supports all the generic stream functionalities. Read more about streams.

var sampleStream = userClient.Streams.CreateSampleStream();
sampleStream.TweetReceived += (sender, eventArgs) =>
{
    Console.WriteLine(eventArgs.Tweet);
};

await sampleStream.StartAsync();

Events¶

The sample stream supports all the generic stream events.

Event Description
TweetReceived Indicates that a tweet was created
